#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
int main()
 {
     int t,i,k;
     scanf("%d",&t);
     while(t--)
     {
         char s1[100009];
         char s2[100009];
         char sf[100009];
         scanf("%s %s",s1,s2);
         int len1=strlen(s1),len2=strlen(s2),c1,c2;
         int min=len1<len2?len1:len2;
         int max=len1<len2?len2:len1;
         int a[max+1];
         a[0]=-1;
         int lena=max+1;
         len1--;
         len2--;
         lena--;
         for(i=min-1;i>=0;i--)
         {
                c1=(int)s1[len1--];
                c2=(int)s2[len2--];
                a[lena--]=c1+c2-65-65;
         }
         while(len1>=0)
         {
             a[lena--]=(int)s1[len1--]-65;
         }
         while(len2>=0)
         {
             a[lena--]=(int)s2[len2--]-65;
         }
         lena=max+1;
         for(i=lena-2;i>=0;i--)
         {
             a[i]+=a[i+1]/26;
             a[i+1]%=26;
         }
         if(a[0]!=-1)
            sf[0]=(a[0]+1+65);
         for(i=1;i<lena;i++)
            sf[i]=(a[i]+65);
         sf[i]='\0';
         if(a[0]!=-1)
            printf("%s",sf);
         else
            for(i=1;i<lena;printf("%c",sf[i++]));
         printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
 }
